name: CoTest - Static Software Testing Tool
description: A comprehensive static analysis tool built with Next.js, Python, and Redis. Analyzes software code quality, identifies vulnerabilities, and integrates with CI/CD pipelines. Implements AST parsing and lexing for deep code analysis.
tech: Next.js, JavaScript, Python, AST, CI/CD, Redis

name: MediscanPlus - Medicine Detection App
description: Innovative mobile app using OCR and NER with PyTorch to scan medicines and provide comprehensive usage and side effect information. College project with advanced ML capabilities and web scraping for real-time data.
tech: React Native, Python, PyTorch, OCR, NER

name: Mental Health Consultation Platform
description: First place hackathon project - A web application for mental health consultations via video and text chat. Built with React and Django, focusing on accessibility and user privacy.

name: Krishi Bazar - E-commerce for Farmers
description: E-commerce platform empowering farmers to sell goods directly and increase income. Built with Next.js and Firebase for real-time data sync and seamless user experience.

name: Learning Platform for Blind People
description: Third place hackathon winner - AI voice assistant-integrated website using AlanAI for blind people to learn and socialize. Features accessible navigation and voice-controlled interactions.

name: Grab A Trek
description: Full-featured trek booking platform for travel enthusiasts. Comprehensive booking system with real-time availability and payment integration.
